content:
Colonel Natalia Humeniuk commented on a pause in massive missile attacks by the enemy, connecting it with the completion of an important stage with quasiporles of the Russian leader.

Natalia Humeniuk's commentsgaveDuring the live broadcast in the TV. One News.

In particular, when asked by the presenter why hostile aviation has not been involved in massive missile blows for a long time, a spokeswoman for the southern Ukraine defense forces associated with a number of factors.

“We carefully monitor the activity of strategic aviation. We understand that in some way the pause is due to the fact that there is no A-50 aircraft in the air. In addition, there are no gunner and reconnaissance center, ”Natalia Humeniuk said.

According to her, previous such operations of the enemy were not too active and effective.

"Taking into account the" airplane ", which has arranged the forces of Ukraine's defense for the Russians, it is also a very dangerous operation next time," - said the spokeswoman for the south.

At the same time, she said, the enemy did not refuse to carry out massive rocket strokes.

“Because this is the main advantage they have the main victories they put their dictator. Therefore, it is necessary to monitor. We keep everything on special control, ”Natalia Humeniuk said.

She also once again warned Ukrainians about the importance of responding to signals of air danger.

“Every warning of danger can be a very active aviation of the enemy, it can be attracting rocket carriers from the sea because they are there, they are equipped. But tomorrow will be 4 weeks as they did not go on duty. And it is likely that such a pause can be justified by the completion of the responsible stage for them (the quasipore of the President.

As reported by the Armyinform, Russiacontinuesto hide your ships in ports.
title: In the defense forces commented on pause in massive enemy rocket attacks
description: Natalia Humeniuk provided her comments during a live broadcast in the TV.
author: Army Inform
